verses.name: Revelation 11:13
verses.text: And the same hour was there a great earthquake, and the tenth part of the city fell, and in the earthquake were slain of men seven thousand: and the remnant were affrighted, and gave glory to the God of heaven.

verses.name: Revelation 11:14
verses.text: The second woe is past; and, behold, the third woe cometh quickly.

verses.name: Revelation 11:15
verses.text: And the seventh angel sounded; and there were great voices in heaven, saying, The kingdoms of this world are become the kingdoms of our Lord, and of his Christ; and he shall reign for ever and ever.
